availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ira Fletcher Ellis (Christian County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, merchant. North Carolina native. Son of Ira F. Ellis and Martha Smith Ellis. Married to Eunice E. Ellis. Adopted father of Madge R. Ellis. Merchant in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p.745.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Hopkinsville, p. 34C.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 8565.
"Long Life Is Ended," Hopkinsville Kentuckian (Hopkinsville, KY), April 3, 1915, p. 1.
"Ira F. Ellis (1825-1915)," Find A Grave, Memorial 88537386, accessed July 14, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88537386/ira-f-ellis.
